channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - debug

item.title: Using strace to troubleshoot SELinux problems
item.description: When SELinux is playing tricks on you, you can just "allow" whatever it wants to do, but that is not always an option: sometimes, there is no denial in sight because the problem lays within SELinux-aware applications (applications that might change their behavior based on what the policy sais or â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
